text.text:
Vibes are on fire tonight! The music, the energy, the crowd‚Äîeverything‚Äôs electric!"

This highlights the fun atmosphere and excitement of the club!

Prices - mens with 1 beer - 45$
Women with one beer - 35$
And it changes according to the promos and festive season..

text.text:
Capital at Clarke Quay offers an unforgettable nightclub experience with its seamless blend of lively music, premium service, and unique ambiance. From the moment you climb the stairs to enter, the floral-like fragrance and modern decor set the stage for an upscale yet fun night out.

The DJ expertly mixes pop hits and EDM tracks, keeping the energy high throughout the night. The central bar area is a visual highlight, featuring contemporary koi fish art on the ceiling, a sleek white plant centerpiece, and a chic vibe. Drinks are available √† la carte, with special discounts for professionals like bankers, lawyers, real estate agents, and air stewards who show their business cards.

For larger groups, booking a table with a minimum spend unlocks the full Capital experience. Ordering champagne, vodka, or tequila bottles transforms into a mini-show, as a parade of synchronized staff delivers your drinks with props, confetti, and synchronized dancing. Watching the procession is pure entertainment! The service is impeccable‚Äîstaff clear confetti instantly, mix drinks at your table, and work together seamlessly. Even the table bins are cleverly designed for quick clean-ups.

The club‚Äôs interior combines old-world charm with modern flair, showcasing glass-encased decor and lush greenery. While the toilets are limited (just four stalls each for men and women), popcorn carts near the restroom add a playful touch.

Perfect for patrons in their 20s and 30s, Capital is ideal for a night of great music, drinks, and memories.

text.text:
Went for international womens day, they had two female DJs, Krisha and Casey both are so skilled and music was a good mix with some RnB, kpop, pop, edm üî•

Since i went early and was alone, one staff Shermaine talked to me and made me feel welcome, even introduce me to other staff and ask them to take care of me, super touched ü•π

Throughout the night I felt safe and well taken care of, first time the staff smile and recognize me even though it was my first time (not even a regular) üò≠

I also accidentally spilled abit of water and the staff came to clean right away without me asking üòÇ very clean club overall

1 for 1 premium pours before midnight also quite worth it around $20 for two drinks whereas i experienced paying $35 for two drinks at other clubs before

text.text: First time clubbing in Singapore and really enjoyed my time at Capital Zouk! Fun music, not too crowded. Didn't order food but ordered drinks. Friend got us sofa for 13 people. Came around 11:30pm and stayed until closing at 3am. Felt safe.

originalText.text: First time clubbing in Singapore and really enjoyed my time at Capital Zouk! Fun music, not too crowded. Didn't order food but ordered drinks. Friend got us sofa for 13 people. Came around 11:30pm and stayed until closing at 3am. Felt safe.

text.text:
Pretty good experience here each time - with very decent house DJs and music. Service has definitely improved over time and the staff can handle the crowd more effectively with reduced waiting time, more professionalism. The layout is modern and segmented in very different areas for various atmosphere - either within the plush sofas in the middle of the dance floor, along the island bar, or a more ‚Äúquieter‚Äùcorner of the club. VIP seats also available by the DJ console. Not sure about the food though as majority of patrons, including me, visit only for the music and drinks.

Min age requirement of 21 for females and 23 for men. They are now operating on Thurs, Fri, Sat and eve of Public Holidays. Do check their website and socials for special guest DJs and nights. Generally opened from 10pm-3am. Big shoutout to Cheryl and Claudia for 10/10 hospitality always!
